Elmina.title: Elmina
Elmina.byline: Elmina is a city in Coastal Plain region of Ghana.

Elmira (New York).title: Elmira (New York)
Elmira (New York).byline: Elmira is the name of both a small city and a township in Chemung County in New York state.

Elmira (Ontario).title: Elmira (Ontario)
Elmira (Ontario).byline: Elmira is a community of about 10,000 people (2016) in Woolwich Township in the Region of Waterloo, in Southwestern Ontario.

Elmsford.title: Elmsford
Elmsford.byline: Elmsford is a village in Westchester County in the state of New York in the United States of America.
